name: 3rd Street Leadership Academy
description: The 3rd Street Leadership Academy (3LA) is designed to engage youth in civics and advocacy. After graduating from the Youth Outreach Squad, where they learn about health issues, youth can join 3LA to dive deeper into the social and environmental issues that impact their health and the health of the neighborhood.
